SLSC Electronic Datasheet (EDS) Addon

This SLSC EDS Addon provides the ability to monitor and communicate with any SLSC Module inside a SLSC Chassis in a generic way.

What do you want to do?

Import properties and commands of a SLSC board for use in VeriStand

To import the capabilities file from a SLSC module, select the SLSC EDS in the slot where the module is installed. If the chassis is online, the SLSC EDS will communicate with the module, extract the Capabilities file, and create channels for properties and commands. If the system is offline, you can configure the SLSC module by pointing to a capabiities file that was previously saved on your computer.

Change properties and commands of a SLSC board

To change the properties and commands to be used by VeriStand, select an item in the "Tree control" and, after selected, change the parameter on the value control. Use Remove button to avoid creating a channel for this property/command. Use Add to create a channel that allow you to programmatically change the value dynamically.

Disable Add-on

To disable this add-on, right click on the add-on instance and select Disable from the shortcut menu. This is used when you want to keep the connection to the parameters, but you do not want the custom device to be deployed to the target.
